title: Reporting a Player Outside of Game Client
body: Hello, last night, a player in my game decided to sell all his items and afk at fountain 40 minutes in. Unfortunately this happened right as the servers went down, and I was unable to use the in-client report service. I know there used to be a way to open a support ticket to report a player on the website.. But I haven't been able to find it. Is there still a way to do this?

replies.body:
If you happen to miss the chance to report a player through the game client in post-game lobby, you can always send a report via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (pick any category, but the first one works best). 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you! That's what I needed to know.
